references.paper_title: Combining labeled and unlabeled data with co-training

references.paper_title: Sharpness-aware minimization for efficiently improving generalization
references.reason: This paper introduces Sharpness-Aware Minimization (SAM), a key technique integrated into the proposed approach to enhance generalization performance.

references.paper_title: Co-teaching: Robust training of deep neural networks with extremely noisy labels

references.paper_title: Maximum likelihood from incomplete data via the EM algorithm
references.reason: This seminal paper details the Expectation-Maximization (EM) algorithm, which provides the theoretical foundation for analyzing and understanding the convergence of interactive teaching.

references.paper_title: Sharp minima can generalize for deep nets
